channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi Energy -- eSOMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi Energy -- eSOMS

item.title: CVE-2023-5516|2024-08-02T07:59:44.747Z -- hitachi%20energy -- esoms
item.description: Poorly constructed webap requests and URI components with special characters trigger unhandled errors and exceptions, disclosing information about the underlying technology and other sensitive information details. The website unintentionally reveals sensitive information including technical details like version Info, endpoints, backend server, Internal IP. etc., which can potentially expose additional attack surface containing other interesting vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2023-5515|2024-08-02T07:59:44.854Z -- hitachi%20energy -- esoms
item.description: The responses for web queries with certain parameters disclose internal path of resources. This information can be used to learn internal structure of the application and to further plot attacks against web servers and deployed web applications.

item.title: CVE-2023-5514|2024-08-02T07:59:44.760Z -- hitachi%20energy -- esoms
item.description: The response messages received from the eSOMS report generation using certain parameter queries with full file path can be abused for enumerating the local file system structure.
